verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is Lord of heaven
Lord of earth
Our Prophet - Priest & King
He has triumphed o'er sins
Fatal curse
Oh death where is thy sting

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
There is no other name
There is no other name
Under heaven whereby
We are saved
There is no other name

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Jesus the name
Jehovah saves
Oh seed of Abraham
By the blood of his cross
He has laid
Salvation's perfect plan
